div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: ✅ Optimizations In Use

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ⚠️ Performance Bottlenecks

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Complexity Analysis

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Best Case: O(1)
• Ray misses grid bounds
• Returns sky color

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Average Case: O(C × K)
• C = cells traversed (~10-30)
• K = objects per cell (~5-50)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Worst Case:
O(200 × 8192 + E × N × 8)
• 200 cells (max)
• 8192 objects/cell (capacity)
• E emissive triangles
• N total geometry
• 8 bounces
= ~1.6M + emissive_cost

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Shadow Rays: O(N+M) brute force
• Test ALL boxes
• Test ALL triangles
• Per emissive light
• Per shaded pixel
Impact: CRITICAL

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Fine Grid Memory: 32KB/cell
• Fixed array: 8192 objects
• 64³ grid = 8.6 GB
• Mostly empty
Impact: HIGH

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Scattered Memory Access
• DDA path varies per pixel
• Poor warp coherency
• Random object_indices reads
Impact: MEDIUM

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Texture Sampling in Intersection
• Alpha-tested triangles
• Rejected hits pay sampling cost
• Inside tight DDA loop
Impact: MEDIUM

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Moving Boxes Bypass Grid
• Every ray tests all moving boxes
• Hardcoded: last 3 boxes
• No spatial culling
Impact: LOW (only 3 boxes)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Early Ray Termination
If hit closer than next cell boundary

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
LOD Culling
Objects < 2 pixels on screen
Distance > 200 units

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Russian Roulette
Stop bounces at reflectivity < 0.01

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Shadow Ray Early-Outs
Facing checks before occlusion test

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Safe Inverse Direction
Epsilon protection prevents NaN

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Workgroup Size: 8×8
Matches typical GPU architecture

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Dominates cost in
complex glTF scenes

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Limits scene size
GPU memory bound

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Reduces cells traversed
by ~30-50%

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Culls distant objects
reduces grid density
